comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Date on negative is 9/4/13. NYT of Dec 14, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9806E0D61139E633A... suggests that she was in a very successful play "Within the Law" in September (assuming she played the whole run). See also www.ibdb.com/production.php?id=7012 for information on the play. See www.flickr.com/photos/castlekay/3884956701/ for another picture on Flickr.

comment._content: increasing dressing style in the society - compared to today's society - the photography really captured the beauty and classiness of the way she dressed and holds herself

comment.author: 45416799@N08
comment._content: She looks so classic. This is a typical fashion photo.  You can see how some designers, styles, and trends get some of their influences from the the past style as well as their own ideas and imaginations.
